T04D3894:50a-1: na r'a k'a ra bim shik'a /
T04D3894:50a-3: rnam pa med pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa /
T04D3894:50a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04D3894:50a-7: 'jig rten kun gyi bde skyed pa'i //
T04D3894:50a-8: mgon po la ni mgos phyag 'tshal //
T04D3894:50b-0: rnam pa kun las @50b rnam grol ba'i //
T04D3894:50b-1: shes pa nam mkha' dang 'dra ba //
T04D3894:50b-2: yang dag don dam yin pa ru //
T04D3894:50b-3: lung rigs mkhas pa gzhan dag 'dod //
T04D3894:50b-4: rnam pa zad pa bden pa ste //
T04D3894:50b-5: rnam pa yang ni brdzun pa yin //
T04D3894:50b-6: ji srid du ni rnam pa snang //
T04D3894:50b-7: de srid shes skye 'khrul pa yin //
T04D3894:50b-8: zad pa med pa'i 'khrul rgyud la //
T04D3894:50b-9: shes pa rnam pa med 'dzin pa //
T04D3894:50b-10: 'khrul pa thams cad kyi ni gzhi //
T04D3894:50b-11: shes pa rnam med bdag nyid yin //
T04D3894:50b-13: nam mkha' 'ang 'khrul pa med mi srid //
T04D3894:50b-14: 'khrul pa rgyu med yin zhe na //
T04D3894:50b-15: rtag tu yod par thal bar 'gyur //
T04D3894:50b-16: rgyu dang bcas na brdzun min te //
T04D3894:50b-17: de ni gzhan dbang yin par gsal //
T04D3894:50b-18: mngon sum mam ni rjes dpag gis //
T04D3894:50b-19: rnam pa med par sgrub par byed //
T04D3894:50b-20: rnam pa de las log pas na //
T04D3894:50b-21: mngon sum gyis ni rtogs ma yin //
T04D3894:50b-22: brdzun par snang ba'i shes pa ni //
T04D3894:50b-23: 'khrul nyid phyir na tshad ma min //
T04D3894:50b-24: shes pa nam mkha' dang 'dra ba //
T04D3894:50b-25: da ltar nyams su myong ba med //
T04D3894:50b-27: de phyir mngon sum tshad ma min //
T04D3894:50b-28: chos can mngon sum ma grub la //
T04D3894:50b-29: rjes dpag nges par 'jug pa med //
T04D3894:50b-30: brdzun pa'i rnam pa rtags yin phyir //
T04D3894:50b-31: bsgrub bya sgrub byed gnas pa med //
T04D3894:50b-33: rjes su dpag pa'ang bslad pa yin //
T04D3894:50b-34: de phyir rnam pa med sgrub pa'i //
T04D3894:50b-35: tshad ma nyid ni yod ma yin //
T04D3894:50b-36: rnam pa med par lung gis kyang //
T04D3894:50b-37: sgrub par byed pa'i gsung rab med //
T04D3894:50b-38: rmi lam sgyu ma dang mtshungs par //
T04D3894:50b-39: chos kun sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan //
T04D3894:50b-40: lung dang rigs pa gnyis kyis gsal bar rab grub pa //
T04D3894:50b-41: gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs shes pa'i rang bzhin rnam dag pa //
T04D3894:50b-42: gsal bar snang ba ma lus gzhi ni rnam spangs pa //
T04D3894:50b-43: rnam pa med par snang ba'i gsal 'ga' yod ma yin //
T04D3894:50b-44: du ma zhe'am gcig nyid yin //
T04D3894:50b-45: brtags par 'gyur phyir de nyid min //
T04D3894:50b-46: ma khyab ce na'ang khyab nyid yin //
T04D3894:50b-47: mi gsal ba'am gsal ba nyid //
T04D3894:50b-48: mi rtag pa la rtag ces pa //
T04D3894:50b-49: bdag tu smra dang mtshungs par 'gyur //
T04D3894:50b-50: mi rtag skad cig yin smra na //
T04D3894:50b-51: de dag phan tshun ldan pa med //
T04D3894:51a-0: @51a * // rnam pa'i skabs na shes yin na //
T04D3894:51a-1: ji ltar khyab pa zhes byar brjod //
T04D3894:51a-2: rnam pa brdzun pa yin pa'i phyir //
T04D3894:51a-3: khyab pa'i nus pa yod mi srid //
T04D3894:51a-4: shes pa khyab pa'i nus med la //
T04D3894:51a-6: nam mkha' khyab bya yin zhe na //
T04D3894:51a-7: nam mkha' yod par 'dod dam ci //
T04D3894:51a-8: nam mkha' sun ni phyung nyid kyis //
T04D3894:51a-9: shes pa sun ni byung ba 'thob //
T04D3894:51a-10: gcig dang du ma dang bral bas //
T04D3894:51a-11: shes pa'ang brdzun pa nyid du 'gyur //
T04D3894:51a-12: shes pa rnam med mtha' yas pa ru snang //
T04D3894:51a-13: longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku gnyis kyi //
T04D3894:51a-14: gzhi ru nges pa tshogs gnyis dang ldan nyid //
T04D3894:51a-15: de 'dra dpal ldan chos sku yin zhes smra //
T04D3894:51a-16: rnam pa med pa'i shes pa nam mkha' dang 'dra chos kyi sku //
T04D3894:51a-17: gang tshe rnam pa des bskyed de yang 'khrul tshogs cis ma yin //
T04D3894:51a-18: 'on te brdzun par rtogs phyir de la 'khrul grub pa yod min na //
T04D3894:51a-19: brdzun 'gyur mi rigs de ni gzhan dbang ma yin nam //
T04D3894:51a-20: rnam pa thams cad mi gsal zhe na khyed kyi rnam med ci zhig bya //
T04D3894:51a-21: rnam pa thams cad gsal yin zhe na khyod kyi rnam med ci zhig bya //
T04D3894:51a-22: rnam bsregs shes pa'i rnam pa ji ltar srid par 'gyur //
T04D3894:51a-23: srid na'ang de yi rnam pa sngon med ji ltar 'gyur //
T04D3894:51a-24: chags bral 'dod chags phyir yang skye med bzhin //
T04D3894:51a-25: gal te skye na de yi chags nyid thogs pa med par 'gyur //
T04D3894:51a-26: 'on te sgyu ma nyid du rtogs phyir de dag 'khrul med na //
T04D3894:51a-27: de bzhin 'on te yod na rnam med 'bras bu ci zhig yod //
T04D3894:51a-28: rnam pa med pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa bal yul
